title: Introduction to Bushcraft and Local Ecology in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the primary focus of bushcraft?
choices: Living and thriving in the wilderness using traditional skills
questions.answer: Living and thriving in the wilderness using traditional skills

questions.question: Approximately what percentage of Timor-Leste's land area is covered by forests?
Which of the following is NOT one of the main ecosystem types in Timor-Leste?
What is the highest mountain peak in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a critically endangered bird species in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary goal of the 'Leave No Trace' principles?
choices: To minimize human impact on the environment
To increase tourism in natural areas
questions.answer: To minimize human impact on the environment

questions.question: Which of the following is a valuable timber tree species in Timor-Leste?
What type of forest is typically found at higher elevations in Timor-Leste?
Which animal species is known for its presence in Timor-Leste's coastal areas?
What is the approximate number of plant species found in Timor-Leste?
Which traditional practice aligns well with modern bushcraft principles?
What is a key benefit of learning bushcraft skills in Timor-Leste?
choices: Deeper connection to the natural world
questions.answer: Deeper connection to the natural world

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical component of bushcraft skills?
What type of ecosystem supports mangrove forests in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a traditional farming technique mentioned in the text?
What is the primary threat to sandalwood in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a Leave No Trace principle adapted for Timor-Leste?
choices: Respect local communities and their land use
Use established fire rings when available
Build permanent structures for future use
questions.answer: Build permanent structures for future use

questions.question: What is the conservation status of sandalwood in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a proper waste disposal method in bushcraft?
What is the recommended action when observing wildlife in Timor-Leste?
choices: Feed them to gain their trust
Use flash photography for better pictures

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential use for sandalwood in bushcraft?
What should be considered when camping on beaches in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is a proper practice when foraging in Timor-Leste?
choices: Harvesting all edible plants in an area
Taking only what is needed and leaving some behind
questions.answer: Taking only what is needed and leaving some behind

questions.question: What is the recommended approach to fire-making in bushcraft?
choices: Build large fires to ward off animals
Use only fallen, dead wood and burn it completely
Cut down green trees for better fuel
Leave fires burning when leaving camp
questions.answer: Use only fallen, dead wood and burn it completely

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a major ecosystem in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary reason for learning about local plant and animal species in bushcraft?
choices: To inform decisions about resources and hazards
questions.answer: To inform decisions about resources and hazards

questions.question: Which of the following is a recommended practice when washing in natural areas?
choices: Use strong chemical soaps for better cleaning
Use biodegradable soap away from water sources
questions.answer: Use biodegradable soap away from water sources

questions.question: What is the significance of bushcraft skills in modern Timor-Leste?
choices: They are only useful for military training

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a potential benefit of promoting bushcraft in Timor-Leste?
What is the recommended action when encountering cultural artifacts during bushcraft activities?
choices: Leave them in place and respect their significance
Sell them to fund conservation efforts
questions.answer: Leave them in place and respect their significance
